name: Mateman
description:
MATEMAN: Join the round Game Description

A mobile game designed to bring together the people of Argentina and spread the mate culture around the globe. The objective is to bring people of conflictive stances to your Mate rounds and avoid crowding, people of different points of view will fight one another unless they are drinking Mate. As the Mate is shared, tolerance will grow, and those with nothing in common will emphatise with each other's, and give you matecoins. This reward will allow the Mateman to buy upgrades, and colonize other parks with the culture of Mate.
